importantArticles.headline: JACKSONVILLE, Fla., April 16, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- CSX Corp. (NASDAQ: CSX) today announced first quarter 2025 operating income of $1.04 billion compared to $1.34 billion in the prior year period. Net income was $646 million, or $0.34 per diluted share, compared to $880 million, or $0.45 per diluted share, in the same period last year. 1 Total volume of 1.52 million units for the quarter was 1% lower compared to first quarter 2024. Revenue totaled $3.42 billion for the quarter, decreasing 7%
importantArticles.title: CSX Corp. Announces First Quarter 2025 Results
